backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with authorization, storage mixins, Stripe config, and data models for users, deals, buyers, contracts, analytics, and payment sessions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for navigation, responsiveness, and UI error‑fix work.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of each frontend file including pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-driven OKLCH color theme defining light/dark tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component handling authentication, backend/identity initialization, routing, and payment result pages with robust error states.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access-denied message with optional back button using card UI components.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: Renders detailed deal analysis data including ARV, MAO, comps, and rating badge.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application shell that manages navigation, mobile menu, lazy‑loaded pages, and logout logic based on user profile state.
frontend/src/components/AppShellErrorBou: Error boundary component that catches rendering errors in the app shell and displays a fallback interface with reset support.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays a compact summary of a buyer with contact info, budget, areas, and an edit trigger.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Dialog for creating, editing, and deleting buyers with form state and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Fetches and displays contracts for a deal with loading, error, and download handling.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Uploads contract documents with validation, progress tracking, and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Shows a summary of a real estate deal including address, seller, ARV, offer, and estimated profit with an edit option.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Modal form for creating, editing, and deleting deals with field state management and query mutations.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: Displays a locked feature card prompting users to upgrade their membership tier.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Builds a 6‑month bar chart of profit and estimated fees from deal data.
frontend/src/components/PageQueryErrorSt: Generic error state component with retry, secondary actions, and optional contact support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new users to enter basic profile info and save it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Renders a table listing total profit aggregated by zip code.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Sign‑in page using Internet Identity with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Startup error screen offering retry and contact support options.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Initial loading screen showing branding and a spinner while the app initializes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto‑initializing admin access and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Builds a backend actor with safer admin‑token handling, exposes loading/error states, and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity auth context that loads, manages, and exposes user identity and login state to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: React hook for tracking CSS media‑query matches, with a helper for detecting mobile screens.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with react‑query, providing typed data fetching, mutations, and normalized error handling for profiles, deals, admin checks, and more.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styling plus custom CSS variables defining the app’s dark theme color system and typography rules.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Centralized text copy for navigation labels, errors, empty states, locked features, admin UI, and support messaging.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Utility functions for calculating MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fees in deals.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Helpers determining feature access and limits based on membership tier, plus a utility for generating locked‑feature messages.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Formats bigint cents to USD strings and parses USD strings back into bigint cents.
frontend/src/lib/support.ts: Support utilities for generating and opening mailto links to the app’s support email.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and mounts the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing membership pricing, granting tiers, and configuring Stripe, with stateful forms and access control.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Enterprise‑only analytics dashboard showing performance metrics and profit-by-zip table with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Pro/Enterprise‑tier page for listing, creating, and editing buyers with dialogs, error states, and access gating.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Enterprise‑only contracts manager allowing users to select deals, upload documents, and view contract lists with error fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard summarizing deal metrics, charts, and membership info with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: AI‑powered deal analyzer that processes property addresses, displays results, and allows adding analyzed deals to the pipeline.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Renders the deals pipeline UI, fetching user deals, enforcing membership limits, and providing deal creation/editing dialogs across pipeline stages.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Displays membership tiers and pricing, allowing users to initiate Stripe checkout sessions for upgrades with monthly or annual billing.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment-canceled message, extracts the Stripe session ID, and provides navigation options to retry or return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Handles successful Stripe checkouts by confirming membership purchase, updating the user profile, and displaying success or error states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, fonts, and plugins for the app's UI design system.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, known issues, and feature requirements, indicating the app has navigation and sidebar bugs to resolve.
